int compute_first_part(int a[5]) {

    int r[5];

    int max_b = -1;

    int last_a = 0;

    int idx =0;

    for (int i=0; i<5; i++) {

        r[i] = a[i]%10;

        if (r[i] !=0) {

            int b = 10 - r[i];

            if (b > max_b || (b == max_b)) {

                max_b = b;

                last_a = a[i];

            }

        }

    }

    // Find the index of last_a in a array, last occurrence.

    idx = -1;

    for (int i=0; i<5; i++) {

        if (a[i] == last_a) {

            idx =i;

        }

    }

    int ans =0;

    for (int i=0; i<5; i++) {

        if (i != idx) {

            if (r[i] ==0) {

                ans += a[i];

            } else {

                ans += a[i] + (10 - r[i]);

            }

        } else {

            ans += a[i];

        }

    }

    return ans;

}
